import React, { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import './Banner.css' import axios from '../../Axios/Axios' import { API } from '../../Constants/Constants' function Banner() { useEffect(() => { axios.get(`trending/all/day?api_key=${API}`).then((response)=>{ console.log(response.data.results[0]) }) },[]) u return (
